name: Taskinator
description:
You’re a little helper robot designed to do various household tasks. One day, when you were out doing errands for your owner, you got lost in the big city. Make your way through the bustling streets and industrial areas to get back home!

Controls:

Left and right arrows / A and D: Move

Space: Jump

I: Powerup selection

Shift keys: Wall climb

Z / L: Dash

X / P: Propeller


Music credit: https://soundcloud.com/namtao/noonehere
